sub_topic: Probability of drawing a certain card from a deck of cards
message_1: What is the probability that a randomly drawn card from a well-shuffled standard deck of 52 playing cards is a King of Hearts?
message_2:
There is only 1 King of Hearts in a standard deck of 52 playing cards. Therefore, the probability of drawing the King of Hearts is 1 out of 52, which can be represented as a fraction:

1/52

This can also be represented as a decimal or percentage:

0.01923 (rounded to 5 decimal places) or 1.923% (rounded to 3 decimal places).
